overview: Freewheeling wanderer Jerry Day and his beautiful wife Toni are at odds over their lifestyle. Jerry can't accept responsibility, but Toni yearns for a family and a settled life. Then the Days 'rediscover' Jerry's young daughter Penny, who has been living with his rich deceased wife's family. Penny appears to be just what Jerry needs to mend his swindling ways and lead a straight life. Then a corruptible influence enters his life.
title: Now and Forever
